name: MonicaandAdam'sWedding
0:
”Alexa, ask Family Wedding Facts to tell me a fact about Adam”
”Ask Family Wedding Facts to tell me a fact.”
”Ask Family Wedding Facts to give me a fact about Monica.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family wedding facts
des: This is a unique addition and reaction to having to write a couple of wedding speeches. Why not have Alexa bring an extra panache to reading out some interesting and, sometimes, embarrassing facts about the bride and groom.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
